subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic opened the defense of his Dubai Championships title with a straight-sets victory over Denis Istomin, and second-seeded Juan Martín del Potro had to retire from his first-round match.
snippet: Novak Djokovic opened the defense of his Dubai Championships title with a straight-sets victory over Denis Istomin, and second-seeded Juan Martín del Potro had to retire from his first-round match.
